about.description: Hello! I am Fernando and I am a Software Developer, Programming Analyst and .NET specialist from Managua, Nicaragua.

Even though I started building applications in my twenties, I quickly became passionate about the world of programming and have never stopped since, because I found my greatest passion in building things that solve problems.

Even before graduating University with a bachelor's degree, I began working as a developer, creating web applications for small businesses and as an intern for local companies, using .NET tools like C#, VB.NET, ASP.NET and SQL Server as a database manager.

Throughout my career, I have been working with many stacks for both back-end and front-end, I could say that the .NET platform is my forte but in the last year I have been focused on learning and building frontend application using React and Typescript.
Take a look at my portfolio below to see what I am working on, and get in touch if you'd like to work together!
